New Records: Glenn Phillips scored the second century of the tournament with 104 runs off 64 balls
Key Match Events: Glenn Phillips and Daryl Mitchell put together a game-changing partnership of 84 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Phillips expressed his satisfaction with the team effort and the World Cup win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Glenn Phillips' innings was unusual as 40 of his runs came running between the wickets
Others: New Zealand posted a good total against Sri Lanka, helping them win by 65 runs
